items.sentence: Tom sits in his room all day and does nothing.
You\'re the most beautiful woman in the world.
You\'re the most beautiful women in the world.
You\'re the only one who knows how to do this.
Could you get me a glass of ice water, please?

Here\'s a list of things that Tom needs to do.
Don\'t act like you don\'t know what\'s wrong.
Tom is definitely not stupid. He\'s just lazy.
